SEARCH
Module org.klojang.jdbc
Package org.klojang.jdbc

Class MappifierFactory

java.lang.Object
org.klojang.jdbc.MappifierFactory
public final class MappifierFactory extends Object

A factory for ResultSetMappifier instances. This class behaves analogously to the BeanifierFactory class. See there for more details.

Author:
Ayco Holleman

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MappifierFactory()
    Creates a new MappifierFactory.
    MappifierFactory(NameMapper columnToKeyMapper)
    Creates a new MappifierFactory using the specified column-to-key mapper.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ResultSetMappifier
    getMappifier(ResultSet rs)
    Returns a ResultSetMappifier that will convert the rows in the specified ResultSet into Map<String, Object> pseudo-objects.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • MappifierFactory

      public MappifierFactory()
      Creates a new MappifierFactory. Column names will be mapped as-is to map keys.

    • MappifierFactory

      public MappifierFactory(NameMapper columnToKeyMapper)
      Creates a new MappifierFactory using the specified column-to-key mapper.
      Parameters:
      columnToKeyMapper - a NameMapper mapping column names to map keys
      See Also:
      • SnakeCaseToCamelCase

  • Method Details

    • getMappifier

      public ResultSetMappifier getMappifier(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Returns a ResultSetMappifier that will convert the rows in the specified ResultSet into Map<String, Object> pseudo-objects.
      Parameters:
      rs - the ResultSet
      Returns:
      a ResultSetMappifier that will convert the rows in the specified ResultSet into Map<String, Object> pseudo-objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs
